posts.title: Black Steel Ceramic Quartz Watch
posts.content: Place a stylish spin on the way you tell time with this elegant black steel ceramic quartz watch. Instead of relying on a standard flat face, this steel and ceramic watch sports a three dimensional surface that contours outwards and lets you feel the time through touch.

posts.title: Cypress Tree Coffee Table
posts.content: Add a subtle touch of natural beauty to your living room using this cypress tree coffee table. The table stands twenty-one inches tall, features a lovely cypress tree base forged from aluminum iron, and is complemented by a circular glass top.

posts.title: Did You Feed The Dog?
posts.content: Avoid accidentally starving your pooch by relying on this dog feeding daily reminder board. Constructed from high-impact ABS plastic, it’s easily mountable and comes with an “A.M.” and “P.M.” section that helps you keep track of things so you don’t overfeed Rex.

posts.title: Smartphone Assisted Stud Finder
posts.content: Take the guesswork out of your next construction project with this smartphone assisted stud finder. Rather than having to rely on expensive tools, this attachment lets you see up to four inches through drywall and concrete to detect studs, wires, and pipes.

posts.title: Silicone Jar Scraping Spoon
posts.content: Ensure you get every last bit from from jars by swapping out your traditional spoon for this silicone jar scraping spoon. The ingenious design features a flat squeegee tip and flexible sides that will effectively help you scrape those hard to reach spots and corners.

posts.title: Bedside Caddy
posts.content: Keep every important appliance in your life close at hand by placing them inside the bedside caddy. This functional caddy can be mounted on all types of furniture and features enough space to neatly store laptops, TV remotes, phones, and books.

posts.title: EZ-Load Toilet Paper Holder
posts.content: Facilitate the task of changing out your role of T.P. by installing the EZ-Load toilet paper holder in your bathroom. It comes with spring hinges on both sides so that you can single-handedly switch out rolls with just one fluid motion.

posts.title: Octopus Tentacle Ring
posts.content: Take a piece of the sea with you wherever you go by accenting your look with this octopus tentacle ring. This nautically themed accessory depicts a silver tentacle wrapping around your finger with its suction cups points outwards.

posts.title: Coffee Bitch Slap
posts.content: Ensure you’re energized for the long day ahead by starting your morning with a little Coffee Bitch Slap. This exotic specialty blend combines the best African and South American beans for an incredibly potent yet smooth taste.

posts.title: Theft-Proof Drawstring Backpack
posts.content: Ensure all your gear remains safe when you leave it unattended by storing it inside this theft-proof drawstring backpack. It features a tough slash-proof exterior and is designed so you can easily lock it and secure it to any sturdy object.

posts.title: Leatherman Signal Multi-Tool
posts.content: Ensure you’re prepared for whatever comes your way when you’re on the job or in the wild, by packing along the Leatherman Signal multi-tool. This versatile tool weighs only 7.5 ounces and comes stocked with a total of 10 tools that range from a sharp blade to a fire starter.

posts.title: Instant Cure Super Glue
posts.content: Every other adhesive in your home just became obsolete thanks to Total Repair – the instant cure super glue. This revolutionary light-curing adhesive dries ten times faster than regular super glue, can fill gaps, and make precise repairs.
